name: SonarQubeAnalyze
description: Run scanner and upload the results to the SonarQube or SonarCloud server.
helpMarkDown:
This task is not needed for Maven and Gradle projects since the scanner should be run as part of the build.

[More Information](http://redirect.sonarsource.com/doc/install-configure-scanner-tfs-ts.html)
author: sonarsource
